text: hi I'm David I'm a software development
engineer at AWS I'm in the ec2 memo team
and I've been there for seven years
being a software engineer at Easter
member team is really exciting we work
with some really amazing people and
amazing technologies that support all of
AWS so our code gets deployed to
millions of servers and the efficiency
improvements that we make there directly
benefit our customers and actually the
planets if you think about the power
savings
[Music]
a friend of mine introduced me to AWS in
Cape Town and said you should come down
and do a pizza day so I applied for this
pizza day being told that I'm not a
student anymore you should apply for the
official position so I did so and one
thing led to another and I arrived at
Amazon so I kind of just went with it
and here I still am
one of the memorable moments for me was
when we were designing a solution on a
whiteboard and some members were in the
office and some members were remote and
we had the camera pointing and it was
kind of a crazy covered world but we
made it work and it was actually pretty
fun doing it like that
if you're looking at joining AWS and
you're a very driven person and you have
passion for programming and computer
science AWS is perfect for you
[Music]
